list.title: module:embedding-service
list.description: Embeds user input and job entries with Gemini, then stores the resulting vectors in Qdrant.

list.title: module:embedding-service~saveJobEntry
list.description: Passess a cleaned version of a job entry into gemini's embedding model and turns it into a vector. It then saves that vector to the QDrant database.

list.title: module:embedding-service~saveUserEmbedding
list.description: Passes a cleaned version of userInput into gemini's embedding model and turns it into a vector. It then saves that vector to the QDrant database.

list.title: module:error-handler.asyncHandler
list.description: Wraps async route handlers to catch errors

list.title: module:job-utils
list.description: Utility functions for parsing job entries and more.

list.title: module:job-utils.parseJobEntry
list.description: Turns the JSON of the job entry into a string so the embedding model can understand it better.

list.title: module:rate-limiter
list.description: Rate Limiting Middleware. Implements rate limiting to prevent API abuse

list.title: module:rate-limiter.rateLimiter
list.description: General rate limiter for all API endpoints

list.title: module:user-utils
list.description: Utility functions for parsing user input and more.

list.title: module:user-utils~parseUserInput
list.description: Turns the JSON of the user's reponses into a string so the embedding model can understand it better

list.title: scripts/generate-docs.js
list.description: Script to generate JSDoc documentation and optionally open it in a browser. Uses child_process to run JSDoc and readline to prompt the user.
